Mug.description: A custom mug engraved with initials in gold leaf. Unused.

Knife.description: A high-end Japanese steel knife, extremely sharp and perfectly clean.

Plate.description: A polished porcelain plate with gold trim.

Fridge.description: A smart fridge with an LCD display and stocked with imported cheeses and bottled water.

CoffeeMachine.description: An espresso machine worth more than a used car. Looks freshly polished.

Cup.description: A fragile crystal glass, possibly Baccarat. Never used.

Shelf.description: A marble shelf with pristine art books and luxury scented candles.

Microwave.description: A designer microwave that blends into the custom cabinetry. Unused.

SoapBottle.description: A $40 soap bottle, perfectly arranged on a marble countertop.

Statue.description: A small bronze statue of a horse, clearly expensive.

Drawer.description: A perfectly clean drawer, possibly never used.

Bread.description: A loaf of bread wrapped in silk paper. Probably from a boutique bakery.
